editorialNotes.tagline: Can you build the best deck?
editorialNotes.standard: PopCap’s done it again. By taking their amazing lawn-battling recipe and changing the ingredients, they’ve created a game that’s undeniably unique. This time, we’re building decks, collecting heroes and fighting friends in head-to-head battles. As usual, the humour is plentiful and the animation is wonderful—but Heroes’ smart gameplay and clever challenges are what we just can’t get enough of.

editorialNotes.standard: Think you know solitaire? Think again. Stack cards to cast spells and rid your wizard school of ghosts, mandrakes and more.

name: 新武俠大明星-天下第一聯動

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: Merge numbers to create bigger numbers and repeat to avoid gridlock. The formula may be straightforward, but Threes!’s simplicity belies an endlessly gratifying and remarkably original game that rewards thoughtful strategy over frenzied swiping. With its lovingly crafted design, whimsical music, and carefully considered free model, Threes! Free is a delightful experience you’ll return to again and again.
